safari.heroDescription: Experience the perfect balance of comfort and adventure. Set on a spacious 3×6 m platform, this 12 m² canvas tent has protective side and back walls—giving you privacy and shelter while staying close to nature.

sections.heading: Space & Layout
sections.description: The tent features a well-planned, cozy interior with thoughtful touches for easy living.
features: Side & back wall for privacy and shelter
Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors

sections.heading: Sleep & Comfort
sections.description: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed for guests who prefer a double configuration.
features: Powerful fan for cool summer nights
Small shelving unit for clothes & essentials

sections.heading: Terrace & Garden
sections.description: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs. Enjoy views of the lush tropical garden—beautifully illuminated at night for a romantic ambiance.

sections.heading: Bathrooms
sections.description: Guests have access to shared bathrooms, separate for ladies and gents—kept clean and convenient.

sections.heading: Good to Know
sections.description: During public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January), the village can be lively. Complimentary earplugs are available at reception to ensure a restful night's sleep.
sections.closingNote: A spacious, nature-immersed stay with modern comforts—perfect for travelers who want the outdoors without sacrificing convenience.

cta.heading: Ready to Book Your Safari Tent?
cta.description: Secure your nature-immersed escape at DEVOCEAN Lodge. Direct booking means the best rates and full support from our team.

comfort.heroTitle: More privacy. More comfort. Same wild charm.
comfort.heroDescription: For guests who love the nature-immersed vibe but want extra seclusion and convenience, the Comfort Safari Tent is an upgrade on our classic canvas experience.

sections.heading: Space & Privacy
sections.description: A generous 12 m² canvas tent set on its own platform, with two side walls and a back wall for enhanced seclusion compared to the Standard Safari Tent.
features: Extra privacy: 2 side walls + back wall
Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors

sections.heading: Sleep & Comfort
sections.description: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed. Lighting is conveniently controlled by switches near the entrance.
features: Strong fan for cool summer nights
Small shelving unit for clothing & essentials

sections.heading: Terrace & Garden
sections.description: Enjoy your private wooden terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs, overlooking the lush tropical garden—romantically illuminated at night.

sections.heading: Private Bathroom
sections.description: At the back of the tent, under a charming grass-thatched roof, your en-suite bathroom includes a shower, toilet, and sink—combining convenience with a unique outdoor touch.

sections.heading: Good to Know
sections.description: While DEVOCEAN Lodge is peaceful, the surrounding village can be lively during public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January). Complimentary earplugs are available at reception.
sections.closingNote: A spacious, well-appointed, and private safari-style getaway—perfect for guests who want comfort, seclusion, and the convenience of an en-suite bathroom.

cta.heading: Ready to Book Your Comfort Tent?
cta.description: Upgrade your nature escape with enhanced privacy and en-suite convenience. Book direct for the best rates.

cottage.heroTitle: Rustic charm • Tropical serenity • Modern comfort
cottage.heroDescription: Nestled in our lush tropical garden, the Garden Cottage combines rustic elegance with homely comfort. A red Roman-tiled roof and high white ceiling with dark wooden beams create a spacious, airy retreat filled with character.

sections.heading: Atmosphere & Design
sections.description: The terracotta-tiled floor adds warmth beneath a high, beam-lined ceiling, while soft wheatfield-painted walls enhance the cottage's calm and inviting atmosphere.
features: High white ceiling with dark beams

sections.heading: Terrace & Garden
sections.description: Step outside onto your private wooden terrace, furnished with camping chairs and a side table — a peaceful spot to unwind and take in the lush greenery and gentle garden sounds.

sections.heading: Interior & Amenities
sections.description: Designed for both relaxation and functionality, the Garden Cottage features a Queen-size boxed bed, a working desk with shaded lamp, and a dinner table with chairs.
features: Storage: suitcase shelves, clothes rack, extra shelving

sections.heading: Comfort & Lighting
sections.description: An inverter air conditioner keeps you comfortable in every season, offering both cooling and heating. Soft lighting, including a dimmable main light, lets you set the perfect ambiance for work, rest, or relaxation.

sections.heading: Private Bathroom
sections.description: Just behind the cottage, a charming grass-thatched roundavel houses your private bathroom, complete with a shower, toilet, and sink—combining modern convenience with authentic African flair.

cta.heading: Ready to Book Your Garden Cottage?
cta.description: Experience rustic elegance in our tropical garden retreat. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.

chalet.heroTitle: Romantic seclusion • Rustic elegance • Tropical peace
chalet.heroDescription: Hidden in a secluded corner of the property, the Thatched Chalet offers a tranquil, romantic retreat. Shaded by palms, strelitzia, acacia, ferns, and Indian almond trees, it immerses you in nature without sacrificing comfort or privacy.

sections.heading: Setting & Atmosphere
sections.description: The grass-roofed chalet, supported by sturdy bluegum poles, exudes rustic elegance. An autumn-slate floor blends harmoniously with its lush surroundings, while soft wheatfield-painted walls create a warm and serene indoor ambiance.

sections.heading: Terrace & Garden
sections.description: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs and a dinner table with chairs. Relax in the shade of the garden canopy and enjoy the sights and sounds of nature.

sections.heading: Interior & Comfort
sections.description: Inside, two single beds with pedestals can be combined into a King-size bed for a cozy double setup. Air conditioning ensures year-round comfort, while soft lighting complements the rustic décor.

sections.heading: Private Bathroom
sections.description: The chalet includes a private bathroom with a shower, toilet, and sink, blending convenience with the rustic charm of its natural setting.

sections.heading: Experience
sections.description: Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a peaceful escape, this tiny chalet delivers an unforgettable blend of seclusion, elegance, and comfort—an ideal retreat within DEVOCEAN's tropical haven.

cta.heading: Ready to Book Your Thatched Chalet?
cta.description: Escape to romantic seclusion in our tropical hideaway. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Enjoy your private wooden terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs, overlooking the lush tropical garden—romantically illuminated at night.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]

cottage.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: Rustic charm • Tropical serenity • Modern comfort]
cottage.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Nestled in our lush tropical garden, the Garden Cottage combines rustic elegance with homely comfort. A red Roman-tiled roof and high white ceiling with dark wooden beams create a spacious, airy retreat filled with character.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Atmosphere & Design]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The terracotta-tiled floor adds warmth beneath a high, beam-lined ceiling, while soft wheatfield-painted walls enhance the cottage's calm and inviting atmosphere.]
features: [TRANSLATE: High white ceiling with dark beams]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step outside onto your private wooden terrace, furnished with camping chairs and a side table — a peaceful spot to unwind and take in the lush greenery and gentle garden sounds.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Interior & Amenities]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Designed for both relaxation and functionality, the Garden Cottage features a Queen-size boxed bed, a working desk with shaded lamp, and a dinner table with chairs.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Storage: suitcase shelves, clothes rack, extra shelving]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Comfort & Lighting]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: An inverter air conditioner keeps you comfortable in every season, offering both cooling and heating. Soft lighting, including a dimmable main light, lets you set the perfect ambiance for work, rest, or relaxation.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Just behind the cottage, a charming grass-thatched roundavel houses your private bathroom, complete with a shower, toilet, and sink—combining modern convenience with authentic African flair.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Garden Cottage?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Experience rustic elegance in our tropical garden retreat. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.]

chalet.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: Romantic seclusion • Rustic elegance • Tropical peace]
chalet.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Hidden in a secluded corner of the property, the Thatched Chalet offers a tranquil, romantic retreat. Shaded by palms, strelitzia, acacia, ferns, and Indian almond trees, it immerses you in nature without sacrificing comfort or privacy.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Setting & Atmosphere]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The grass-roofed chalet, supported by sturdy bluegum poles, exudes rustic elegance. An autumn-slate floor blends harmoniously with its lush surroundings, while soft wheatfield-painted walls create a warm and serene indoor ambiance.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs and a dinner table with chairs. Relax in the shade of the garden canopy and enjoy the sights and sounds of nature.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Interior & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Inside, two single beds with pedestals can be combined into a King-size bed for a cozy double setup. Air conditioning ensures year-round comfort, while soft lighting complements the rustic décor.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The chalet includes a private bathroom with a shower, toilet, and sink, blending convenience with the rustic charm of its natural setting.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Experience]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a peaceful escape, this tiny chalet delivers an unforgettable blend of seclusion, elegance, and comfort—an ideal retreat within DEVOCEAN's tropical haven.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Thatched Chalet?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Escape to romantic seclusion in our tropical hideaway. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.]

safari.heroTitle: キャンバスの中の快適さと冒険
safari.heroDescription: 快適さと冒険の完璧なバランスを体験してください。広々とした3×6mのプラットフォームに設置された12㎡のキャンバステントは、サイドウォールとバックウォールで保護され、自然に囲まれながらもプライバシーと遮蔽を確保します。

sections.heading: 空間とレイアウト
sections.description: テント内部は計画性に優れ、居心地が良く、快適な生活を送るための細やかな配慮が行き届いています。
features: プラットフォーム: 3×6m • テント: 12㎡
プライバシーと遮蔽のためのサイド＆バックウォール
すべての窓とドアに防虫ネット装備

sections.heading: 睡眠と快適性
sections.description: ペデスタルとシェード付きランプを備えた2つのシングルベッドは、ダブル設定を希望されるお客様のためにキングサイズベッドに組み合わせることができます。
features: 高品質マットレスとベッドサイド照明
涼しい夏の夜のための強力なファン
衣類と必需品用の小型棚ユニット

sections.heading: テラスとガーデン
sections.description: 巻きパームリーフの椅子が備えられたプライベートテラスへ。緑豊かな熱帯庭園の景色をお楽しみください。夜はロマンチックな雰囲気の中で美しくライトアップされます。
features: プライベートな屋外席
静かな夜のためのナイトライティング

sections.heading: バスルーム
sections.description: ゲストは共用バスルーム（男女別）を利用でき、清潔で便利に保たれています。
features: 各側面に温水・冷水シャワー2基ずつ
各側面にトイレ2器ずつ

sections.heading: ご注意点
sections.description: 祝祭日の週末やハイシーズン（12月下旬から1月上旬）には、村がにぎやかになる場合があります。安らかな夜のお休みを確保するため、レセプションで耳栓を無料でご用意しています。
sections.closingNote: 現代的な快適さを備えた、自然に囲まれた広々とした滞在施設—便利さを犠牲にすることなくアウトドアを楽しみたい旅行者に最適です。

trustItems: 自然に囲まれた快適さ
清潔で整備された施設
リラックスしたロマンチックな夜

cta.heading: サファリテントを予約する準備はできましたか？
cta.description: DEVOCEAN Lodgeで自然に囲まれた逃避行を確保しましょう。直接予約なら最良の料金とスタッフからの全面的なサポートが得られます。

comfort.heroTitle: より高いプライバシー。より高い快適性。同じワイルドな魅力。
comfort.heroDescription: 自然に囲まれた雰囲気を愛するながら、さらに静かで便利な環境を求めるゲストのために、コンフォートサファリテントは私たちのクラシックなキャンバス体験をアップグレードしたものです。

sections.heading: 空間とプライバシー
sections.description: 広々とした12㎡のキャンバステントが専用プラットフォームに設置され、スタンダードサファリテントと比較して、2つのサイドウォールとバックウォールにより遮断性が高められています。
features: テント: 12㎡、専用プラットフォーム上
追加のプライバシー: 2つのサイドウォール + バックウォール
すべての窓とドアに防虫ネット装備

sections.heading: 睡眠と快適性
sections.description: ペデスタルとシェード付きランプを備えた2つのシングルベッドは、キングサイズベッドに組み合わせることができます。照明は入口近くのスイッチで便利に操作できます。
features: キングまたはツイン設定
涼しい夏の夜のための強力なファン
衣類と必需品用の小型棚ユニット

sections.heading: テラスとガーデン
sections.description: 巻きパームリーフの椅子が備えられたプライベート木製テラスをお楽しみください。緑豊かな熱帯庭園を見渡せ、夜はロマンチックにライトアップされます。
features: プライベートな屋外席
庭園の景色、ナイトライティング

sections.heading: 専用バスルーム
sections.description: テントの後方、魅力的な草葺き屋根の下に、シャワー、トイレ、洗面台を備えたエン Suite バスルームがあります。便利さとユニークなアウトドアの趣きを組み合わせています。

sections.heading: ご注意点
sections.description: DEVOCEAN Lodgeは静かですが、周辺の村は祝祭日の週末やハイシーズン（12月下旬から1月上旬）にはにぎやかになる場合があります。レセプションで耳栓を無料でご用意しています。
sections.closingNote: 広々として設備が整い、プライベートなサファリスタイルの隠れ家—快適さ、静けさ、エン Suite バスルームの便利さを求めるゲストに最適です。

trustItems: 自然に囲まれた快適さ
エン Suite バスルームの便利さ
庭園でのロマンチックな夜

cta.heading: コンフォートテントを予約する準備はできましたか？
cta.description: 強化されたプライバシーとエン Suite バスルームの便利さで、自然の中への逃避行をアップグレードしましょう。最良の料金で直接予約してください。

cottage.heroTitle: 素朴な魅力 • 熱帯の静けさ • 現代的な快適さ
cottage.heroDescription: 緑豊かな熱帯庭園に佇むガーデンコテージは、素朴なエレガンスと家庭的な快適さを組み合わせています。赤いローマン瓦の屋根と、ダークウッドの梁が特徴的な高い白い天井が、個性あふれる広々として風通しの良い隠れ家を創り出しています。

sections.heading: 雰囲気とデザイン
sections.description: 梁が印象的な高い天井の下、テラコッタタイルの床が温かみを添え、柔らかな小麦色の壁がコテージの落ち着いた魅力的な雰囲気を高めています。
features: ダークな梁が特徴的な高い白い天井
テラコッタフローリングと温かな壁のトーン

sections.heading: テラスとガーデン
sections.description: キャンプチェアとサイドテーブルが備えられた専用木製テラスへ。緑豊かな植物と穏やかな庭の音に包まれながら、くつろぐための静かなスポットです。
features: 熱帯植物に囲まれた環境

sections.heading: インテリアとアメニティ
sections.description: リラックスと機能性の両方を考慮して設計されたガーデンコテージには、クイーンサイズのボックスベッド、シェード付きランプを備えた作業デスク、そしてダイニングテーブルと椅子が備わっています。
features: 高品質マットレスのクイーンサイズベッド
作業デスクとシェード付きランプ
ダイニングテーブルと椅子
収納：スーツケース棚、衣服ラック、追加棚

sections.heading: 快適性と照明
sections.description: インバーターエアコンが冷暖房を提供し、四季を通じて快適さを保ちます。調光可能なメインライトを含む柔らかな照明が、仕事、休息、またはリラックスのための完璧な雰囲気を演出します。
features: インバーターエアコン（冷房・暖房）
調光可能な照明と温かな室内の光

sections.heading: 専用バスルーム
sections.description: コテージのすぐ後方には、魅力的な草葺きのロンダベル（円形小屋）の中に、シャワー、トイレ、洗面台を備えた専用バスルームがあります。現代的な便利さと本格的なアフリカの趣を組み合わせています。

trustItems: 熱帯の自然に囲まれて
専用エン Suite ロンダベル
エアコン完備で静かな照明

cta.heading: ガーデンコテージを予約する準備はできましたか？
cta.description: 私たちの熱帯庭園の隠れ家で素朴なエレガンスを体験してください。最良の料金とパーソナライズされたサービスのために直接予約ください。

chalet.heroTitle: ロマンチックな隠れ家 • 素朴な優雅さ • 熱帯の平和
chalet.heroDescription: 敷地内のひっそりとした一角に隠れる茅葺きシャレーは、静かでロマンチックな隠れ家を提供します。ヤシ、ストレリチア、アカシア、シダ、モモタマナの木陰に囲まれ、快適さやプライバシーを犠牲にすることなく自然に浸ることができます。

sections.heading: 環境と雰囲気
sections.description: 頑丈なブルーガムポールで支えられた草葺き屋根のシャレーは、素朴な優雅さを放っています。オータムスレートの床は緑豊かな周囲と調和し、柔らかな小麦色の壁が温かく静かな室内の雰囲気を創り出しています。
features: 茅葺き屋根 • ブルーガムポール構造
オータムスレートの床 • ナチュラルトーン
ヤシ、シダ、ストレリチアに囲まれて

sections.heading: テラスとガーデン
sections.description: 巻きパームリーフの椅子とダイニングテーブル、椅子が備えられた専用テラスへ。庭園の木陰でリラックスし、自然の景色と音をお楽しみください。

sections.heading: インテリアと快適性
sections.description: 室内では、ペデスタル付きの2つのシングルベッドを、居心地の良いダブル設定のキングサイズベッドに組み合わせることができます。エアコンが一年中の快適さを確保し、柔らかな照明が素朴な装飾を引き立てます。
features: ツインまたはキングサイズベッド設定
冷房と快適さのためのエアコン
温かな照明と柔らかな室内のトーン

sections.heading: 専用バスルーム
sections.description: シャレーには、シャワー、トイレ、洗面台を備えた専用バスルームが付いており、便利さと自然環境の素朴な魅力を融合させています。

sections.heading: 体験
sections.description: ロマンチックな旅を求めているのか、静かな逃避を求めているのかに関わらず、この小さなシャレーは、隔離性、優雅さ、快適さの忘れられないブレンドを提供します—DEVOCEANの熱帯の楽園の中にある理想的な隠れ家です。

trustItems: ロマンチックで静かな雰囲気
プライベートな快適さと便利さ

cta.heading: 茅葺きシャレーを予約する準備はできましたか？
cta.description: 私たちの熱帯の隠れ家でロマンチックな隔離へ逃げましょう。最良の料金とパーソナライズされたサービスのために直接予約ください。

safari.heroDescription: Испытайте идеальный баланс комфорта и приключений. Установленная на просторной платформе 3×6 м, эта палатка площадью 12 м² имеет защитные боковые и заднюю стенки, обеспечивая уединение и укрытие, пока вы находитесь вблизи природы.

sections.heading: Пространство и Планировка
sections.description: Палатка имеет хорошо продуманный, уютный интерьер с продуманными деталями для легкого проживания.
features: Боковая и задняя стенки для уединения и защиты
Москитные сетки на всех окнах и дверях

sections.heading: Сон и Комфорт
sections.description: Две односпальные кровати с тумбами и абажурами можно объединить в кровать размера «king-size» для гостей, предпочитающих двуспальную конфигурацию.
features: Мощный вентилятор для прохладных летних ночей
Небольшая полка для одежды и мелочей

sections.heading: Терраса и Сад
sections.description: Выйдите на свою частную террасу, обставленную плетеными креслами из пальмовых листьев. Наслаждайтесь видом на пышный тропический сад, который красиво освещается ночью, создавая романтическую атмосферу.
features: Частная зона отдыха на открытом воздухе

sections.heading: Санузлы
sections.description: Гости имеют доступ к общим санузлам, раздельным для мужчин и женщин, которые содержатся в чистоте и удобстве.
features: По 2 душа с горячей/холодной водой с каждой стороны

sections.heading: Важно Знать
sections.description: В выходные дни государственных праздников и в пиковый сезон (конец декабря – начало января) в деревне может быть шумно. Бесплатные беруши доступны на ресепшене, чтобы обеспечить спокойный ночной сон.
sections.closingNote: Просторное проживание, погруженное в природу, с современными удобствами — идеально для путешественников, которые хотят быть на природе, не жертвуя комфортом.

cta.heading: Готовы забронировать сафари-палатку?
cta.description: Обеспечьте себе побег на лоно природы в DEVOCEAN Lodge. Прямое бронирование означает лучшие цены и полную поддержку от нашей команды.

comfort.heroTitle: Больше уединения. Больше комфорта. Та же дикая прелесть.
comfort.heroDescription: Для гостей, которые любят атмосферу единения с природой, но хотят дополнительной уединенности и удобства, Comfort Safari Tent — это улучшенная версия нашего классического палаточного опыта.

sections.heading: Пространство и Уединенность
sections.description: Вместительная палатка площадью 12 м² на собственной платформе, с двумя боковыми стенками и задней стенкой для повышенной уединенности по сравнению со стандартной сафари-палаткой.
features: Дополнительная приватность: 2 боковые стенки + задняя стенка
Москитные сетки на всех окнах и дверях

sections.heading: Сон и Комфорт
sections.description: Две односпальные кровати с тумбами и абажурами можно объединить в кровать размера «king-size». Освещением можно удобно управлять с помощью выключателей у входа.
features: Мощный вентилятор для прохладных летних ночей
Небольшая полка для одежды и мелочей

sections.heading: Терраса и Сад
sections.description: Наслаждайтесь своей частной деревянной террасой с плетеными креслами из пальмовых листьев, с видом на пышный тропический сад, романтично освещенный ночью.
features: Частная зона отдыха на открытом воздухе

sections.heading: Собственная Ванная Комната
sections.description: В задней части палатки, под очаровательной соломенной крышей, находится ваша собственная ванная комната с душем, туалетом и умывальником, сочетающая удобство с уникальной атмосферой отдыха на природе.

sections.heading: Важно Знать
sections.description: Хотя в DEVOCEAN Lodge царит спокойная атмосфера, окружающая деревня может быть оживленной в выходные дни государственных праздников и в пиковый сезон (конец декабря – начало января). На ресепшене доступны бесплатные беруши.
sections.closingNote: Просторный, хорошо оборудованный и уединенный отдых в стиле сафари — идеально для гостей, которые хотят комфорта, уединения и удобства собственной ванной комнаты.

cta.heading: Готовы забронировать комфорт-палатку?
cta.description: Улучшите свой отдых на природе с повышенной уединенностью и удобством собственной ванной комнаты. Бронируйте напрямую для получения лучших цен.

cottage.heroTitle: Деревенское очарование • Тропическое спокойствие • Современный комфорт
cottage.heroDescription: Расположенный в нашем пышном тропическом саду, Садовый Коттедж сочетает в себе деревенскую элегантность и домашний уют. Красная черепичная крыша в римском стиле и высокий белый потолок с темными деревянными балками создают просторное, наполненное воздухом и характером убежище.

sections.heading: Атмосфера и Дизайн
sections.description: Пол из терракотовой плитки добавляет тепла под высоким потолком с балками, а мягкие тона стен цвета пшеничного поля усиливают спокойную и гостеприимную атмосферу коттеджа.
features: Красная черепичная крыша в римском стиле
Высокий белый потолок с темными балками
Терракотовый пол и теплые тона стен

sections.heading: Терраса и Сад
sections.description: Выйдите на свою частную деревянную террасу, обставленную кемпинговыми креслами и боковым столиком — умиротворенное место, чтобы расслабиться и насладиться пышной зеленью и нежными звуками сада.
features: Частная терраса с местами для сидения

sections.heading: Интерьер и Удобства
sections.description: Спроектированный как для отдыха, так и для функциональности, Садовый Коттедж оснащен двуспальной кроватью-платформой, рабочим столом с лампой под абажуром и обеденным столом со стульями.
features: Двуспальная кровать размера «queen-size» с качественным матрасом
Рабочий стол и лампа под абажуром
Хранение: полки для чемоданов, вешалка для одежды, дополнительные полки

sections.heading: Комфорт и Освещение
sections.description: Инверторный кондиционер обеспечивает комфорт в любое время года, предлагая как охлаждение, так и обогрев. Мягкое освещение, включая регулируемый основной свет, позволяет вам установить идеальную атмосферу для работы, отдыха или релаксации.
features: Регулируемое освещение и теплый внутренний свет

sections.heading: Собственная Ванная Комната
sections.description: Прямо за коттеджем в очаровательном круглом сооружении с соломенной крышей (рондавель) расположена ваша собственная ванная комната с душем, туалетом и умывальником, сочетающая современные удобства с подлинным африканским колоритом.

cta.heading: Готовы забронировать садовый коттедж?
cta.description: Испытайте деревенскую элегантность в нашем тропическом саду. Бронируйте напрямую для получения лучших цен и персонализированного обслуживания.

chalet.heroTitle: Романтическое уединение • Деревенская элегантность • Тропический покой
chalet.heroDescription: Спрятанное в уединенном уголке территории, Шале с Соломенной Крышей предлагает спокойный, романтический отдых. Укрытое в тени пальм, стрелиций, акаций, папоротников и терминалий каттапа, оно погружает вас в природу, не жертвуя комфортом или уединенностью.

sections.heading: Окружение и Атмосфера
sections.description: Шале с соломенной крышей, поддерживаемое прочными столбами из эвкалипта, излучает деревенскую элегантность. Пол цвета осеннего сланца гармонично сливается с пышным окружением, а мягкие тона стен цвета пшеничного поля создают теплую и безмятежную внутреннюю атмосферу.
features: Соломенная крыша • конструкция из столбов эвкалипта
Пол цвета осеннего сланца • природные тона

sections.heading: Терраса и Сад
sections.description: Выйдите на свою частную террасу, обставленную плетеными креслами из пальмовых листьев и обеденным столом со стульями. Расслабьтесь в тени садового полога и наслаждайтесь видами и звуками природы.
features: Частная терраса с местами для сидения

sections.heading: Интерьер и Комфорт
sections.description: Внутри две односпальные кровати с тумбами можно объединить в кровать размера «king-size» для уютной двуспальной конфигурации. Кондиционер обеспечивает комфорт круглый год, а мягкое освещение дополняет деревенский декор.
features: Теплое освещение и мягкие внутренние тона

sections.heading: Собственная Ванная Комната
sections.description: В шале есть собственная ванная комната с душем, туалетом и умывальником, сочетающая удобство с деревенским шармом его природного окружения.

sections.heading: Опыт
sections.description: Ищете ли вы романтическое путешествие или спокойный побег, это маленькое шале предлагает незабываемое сочетание уединенности, элегантности и комфорта — идеальное убежище в тропическом раю DEVOCEAN.

cta.heading: Готовы забронировать шале с соломенной крышей?
cta.description: Сбегите в романтическое уединение в нашем тропическом укрытии. Бронируйте напрямую для получения лучших цен и персонализированного обслуживания.

safari.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Experience the perfect balance of comfort and adventure. Set on a spacious 3×6 m platform, this 12 m² canvas tent has protective side and back walls—giving you privacy and shelter while staying close to nature.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Space & Layout]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The tent features a well-planned, cozy interior with thoughtful touches for easy living.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Side & back wall for privacy and shelter]
[TRANSLATE: Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Sleep & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed for guests who prefer a double configuration.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Powerful fan for cool summer nights]
[TRANSLATE: Small shelving unit for clothes & essentials]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs. Enjoy views of the lush tropical garden—beautifully illuminated at night for a romantic ambiance.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Bathrooms]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Guests have access to shared bathrooms, separate for ladies and gents—kept clean and convenient.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Good to Know]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: During public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January), the village can be lively. Complimentary earplugs are available at reception to ensure a restful night's sleep.]
sections.closingNote: [TRANSLATE: A spacious, nature-immersed stay with modern comforts—perfect for travelers who want the outdoors without sacrificing convenience.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Safari Tent?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Secure your nature-immersed escape at DEVOCEAN Lodge. Direct booking means the best rates and full support from our team.]

comfort.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: More privacy. More comfort. Same wild charm.]
comfort.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: For guests who love the nature-immersed vibe but want extra seclusion and convenience, the Comfort Safari Tent is an upgrade on our classic canvas experience.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Space & Privacy]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: A generous 12 m² canvas tent set on its own platform, with two side walls and a back wall for enhanced seclusion compared to the Standard Safari Tent.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Extra privacy: 2 side walls + back wall]
[TRANSLATE: Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Sleep & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed. Lighting is conveniently controlled by switches near the entrance.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Strong fan for cool summer nights]
[TRANSLATE: Small shelving unit for clothing & essentials]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Enjoy your private wooden terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs, overlooking the lush tropical garden—romantically illuminated at night.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: At the back of the tent, under a charming grass-thatched roof, your en-suite bathroom includes a shower, toilet, and sink—combining convenience with a unique outdoor touch.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Good to Know]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: While DEVOCEAN Lodge is peaceful, the surrounding village can be lively during public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January). Complimentary earplugs are available at reception.]
sections.closingNote: [TRANSLATE: A spacious, well-appointed, and private safari-style getaway—perfect for guests who want comfort, seclusion, and the convenience of an en-suite bathroom.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Comfort Tent?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Upgrade your nature escape with enhanced privacy and en-suite convenience. Book direct for the best rates.]

cottage.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: Rustic charm • Tropical serenity • Modern comfort]
cottage.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Nestled in our lush tropical garden, the Garden Cottage combines rustic elegance with homely comfort. A red Roman-tiled roof and high white ceiling with dark wooden beams create a spacious, airy retreat filled with character.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Atmosphere & Design]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The terracotta-tiled floor adds warmth beneath a high, beam-lined ceiling, while soft wheatfield-painted walls enhance the cottage's calm and inviting atmosphere.]
features: [TRANSLATE: High white ceiling with dark beams]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step outside onto your private wooden terrace, furnished with camping chairs and a side table — a peaceful spot to unwind and take in the lush greenery and gentle garden sounds.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Interior & Amenities]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Designed for both relaxation and functionality, the Garden Cottage features a Queen-size boxed bed, a working desk with shaded lamp, and a dinner table with chairs.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Storage: suitcase shelves, clothes rack, extra shelving]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Comfort & Lighting]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: An inverter air conditioner keeps you comfortable in every season, offering both cooling and heating. Soft lighting, including a dimmable main light, lets you set the perfect ambiance for work, rest, or relaxation.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Just behind the cottage, a charming grass-thatched roundavel houses your private bathroom, complete with a shower, toilet, and sink—combining modern convenience with authentic African flair.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Garden Cottage?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Experience rustic elegance in our tropical garden retreat. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.]

chalet.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: Romantic seclusion • Rustic elegance • Tropical peace]
chalet.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Hidden in a secluded corner of the property, the Thatched Chalet offers a tranquil, romantic retreat. Shaded by palms, strelitzia, acacia, ferns, and Indian almond trees, it immerses you in nature without sacrificing comfort or privacy.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Setting & Atmosphere]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The grass-roofed chalet, supported by sturdy bluegum poles, exudes rustic elegance. An autumn-slate floor blends harmoniously with its lush surroundings, while soft wheatfield-painted walls create a warm and serene indoor ambiance.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs and a dinner table with chairs. Relax in the shade of the garden canopy and enjoy the sights and sounds of nature.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Interior & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Inside, two single beds with pedestals can be combined into a King-size bed for a cozy double setup. Air conditioning ensures year-round comfort, while soft lighting complements the rustic décor.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The chalet includes a private bathroom with a shower, toilet, and sink, blending convenience with the rustic charm of its natural setting.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Experience]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a peaceful escape, this tiny chalet delivers an unforgettable blend of seclusion, elegance, and comfort—an ideal retreat within DEVOCEAN's tropical haven.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Thatched Chalet?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Escape to romantic seclusion in our tropical hideaway. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.]

safari.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Experience the perfect balance of comfort and adventure. Set on a spacious 3×6 m platform, this 12 m² canvas tent has protective side and back walls—giving you privacy and shelter while staying close to nature.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Space & Layout]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The tent features a well-planned, cozy interior with thoughtful touches for easy living.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Side & back wall for privacy and shelter]
[TRANSLATE: Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Sleep & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed for guests who prefer a double configuration.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Powerful fan for cool summer nights]
[TRANSLATE: Small shelving unit for clothes & essentials]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs. Enjoy views of the lush tropical garden—beautifully illuminated at night for a romantic ambiance.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Bathrooms]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Guests have access to shared bathrooms, separate for ladies and gents—kept clean and convenient.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Good to Know]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: During public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January), the village can be lively. Complimentary earplugs are available at reception to ensure a restful night's sleep.]
sections.closingNote: [TRANSLATE: A spacious, nature-immersed stay with modern comforts—perfect for travelers who want the outdoors without sacrificing convenience.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Safari Tent?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Secure your nature-immersed escape at DEVOCEAN Lodge. Direct booking means the best rates and full support from our team.]

comfort.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: More privacy. More comfort. Same wild charm.]
comfort.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: For guests who love the nature-immersed vibe but want extra seclusion and convenience, the Comfort Safari Tent is an upgrade on our classic canvas experience.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Space & Privacy]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: A generous 12 m² canvas tent set on its own platform, with two side walls and a back wall for enhanced seclusion compared to the Standard Safari Tent.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Extra privacy: 2 side walls + back wall]
[TRANSLATE: Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Sleep & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed. Lighting is conveniently controlled by switches near the entrance.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Strong fan for cool summer nights]
[TRANSLATE: Small shelving unit for clothing & essentials]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Enjoy your private wooden terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs, overlooking the lush tropical garden—romantically illuminated at night.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: At the back of the tent, under a charming grass-thatched roof, your en-suite bathroom includes a shower, toilet, and sink—combining convenience with a unique outdoor touch.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Good to Know]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: While DEVOCEAN Lodge is peaceful, the surrounding village can be lively during public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January). Complimentary earplugs are available at reception.]
sections.closingNote: [TRANSLATE: A spacious, well-appointed, and private safari-style getaway—perfect for guests who want comfort, seclusion, and the convenience of an en-suite bathroom.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Comfort Tent?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Upgrade your nature escape with enhanced privacy and en-suite convenience. Book direct for the best rates.]

cottage.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: Rustic charm • Tropical serenity • Modern comfort]
cottage.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Nestled in our lush tropical garden, the Garden Cottage combines rustic elegance with homely comfort. A red Roman-tiled roof and high white ceiling with dark wooden beams create a spacious, airy retreat filled with character.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Atmosphere & Design]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The terracotta-tiled floor adds warmth beneath a high, beam-lined ceiling, while soft wheatfield-painted walls enhance the cottage's calm and inviting atmosphere.]
features: [TRANSLATE: High white ceiling with dark beams]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step outside onto your private wooden terrace, furnished with camping chairs and a side table — a peaceful spot to unwind and take in the lush greenery and gentle garden sounds.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Interior & Amenities]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Designed for both relaxation and functionality, the Garden Cottage features a Queen-size boxed bed, a working desk with shaded lamp, and a dinner table with chairs.]
features: [TRANSLATE: Storage: suitcase shelves, clothes rack, extra shelving]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Comfort & Lighting]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: An inverter air conditioner keeps you comfortable in every season, offering both cooling and heating. Soft lighting, including a dimmable main light, lets you set the perfect ambiance for work, rest, or relaxation.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Just behind the cottage, a charming grass-thatched roundavel houses your private bathroom, complete with a shower, toilet, and sink—combining modern convenience with authentic African flair.]

cta.heading: [TRANSLATE: Ready to Book Your Garden Cottage?]
cta.description: [TRANSLATE: Experience rustic elegance in our tropical garden retreat. Book direct for the best rates and personalized service.]

chalet.heroTitle: [TRANSLATE: Romantic seclusion • Rustic elegance • Tropical peace]
chalet.heroDescription: [TRANSLATE: Hidden in a secluded corner of the property, the Thatched Chalet offers a tranquil, romantic retreat. Shaded by palms, strelitzia, acacia, ferns, and Indian almond trees, it immerses you in nature without sacrificing comfort or privacy.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Setting & Atmosphere]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The grass-roofed chalet, supported by sturdy bluegum poles, exudes rustic elegance. An autumn-slate floor blends harmoniously with its lush surroundings, while soft wheatfield-painted walls create a warm and serene indoor ambiance.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Terrace & Garden]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs and a dinner table with chairs. Relax in the shade of the garden canopy and enjoy the sights and sounds of nature.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Interior & Comfort]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: Inside, two single beds with pedestals can be combined into a King-size bed for a cozy double setup. Air conditioning ensures year-round comfort, while soft lighting complements the rustic décor.]

sections.heading: [TRANSLATE: Private Bathroom]
sections.description: [TRANSLATE: The chalet includes a private bathroom with a shower, toilet, and sink, blending convenience with the rustic charm of its natural setting.]
